items.title: How to still get a free checked bag on Southwest flights
items.description: If you usually check your bags when you fly with Southwest Airlines, consider getting a cobranded card since bags no longer fly free with the carrier.

items.title: The best Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday hotel deals you can expect in 2025 (so far)
items.description: This is a great time of year to take advantage of deals from many hotel brands and booking services. Here are a few of our favorites.

items.title: How the Capital One Venture X travel credit can save you $300 on your next trip
items.description: A $300 annual credit significantly offsets the Venture X's $395 annual fee. Here's what you need to know about the using the Venture X travel credit.

items.title: 'Swiss Senses': Onboard the inaugural long-haul flight of Swiss' luxe new Airbus A350
items.description: Swiss has begun a long-awaited renewal of its long-haul product with the intercontinental introduction of its first Airbus A350 to Boston.
